title: San Francisco/The Avenues
name: de Young Museum
price: $10 adults, $7 seniors, $6 teens/students, free for children 12 and under; includes same-day admission to the Legion of Honor. Special exhibits may require extra admission; first Tuesday of each month free
content: A modern and ethnic art focused museum, with three levels of fascinating exhibits with contemporary and historical pieces from America as well as art of Africa, Oceania, and the Americas in a uniquely-designed building with courtyards and sculpture gardens. One corner of the building has a large tower which offers a lovely 360-degree view of the park and surroundings.
